alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 9:23PM EDT until July 29 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Washington County in Rhode Island... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 922 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Montauk Point, or 13 miles east of Gardiners Island, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Block Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
